column4: I just did an rsync command and someone completely deleted my website. any idea how to recover the files?
do you have physical access to the machine?
do you have a copy of the site somewhere or did you delete your only copy?
if you can, turn off the machine forcefully with the drive in it. as in hold down power
the longer a machine is on gives it more time to write to a disk and overwrite the data you want to recover
there are tools that do that, just not the default ones. *nixes expect people to have backups
I went through the instructions with no success.
sorry to keep bugging the instructions were basically the same as the other ones and don't seem to work at all for me.
np. i haven't had that issue so my best guess would be to poke around the ubuntu sound troubleshooting article
restoring sound stuff can be done through the sound troubleshooting document
